description:
NAME
PRUFER - coding or decoding a tree graph with help Prufer code

SYNOPSIS
PRUFER [-h]
PRUFER -c graphname
PRUFER -d Prufer code

DESCRIPTION
PRUFERcoding or decoding your tree graph with method Prufer code
Example of coding Prufer:
1221
Example of decoding Prufer:
0 1 1
1 0 0
1 0 0

COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS
-h, --help - option that shows this text
-c, --coding - coding current tree with Prufer method
-d, --decoding - decoding code Prufer's
name: prufer
